name: user-management-system
description: User Management System with Angular Frontend and Node.js Backend

scripts.install:all: npm install concurrently --legacy-peer-deps && npm run install:angular-tools && cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../backend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.render:build: cd frontend && npm install webpack-cli@5.1.4 --save-dev --legacy-peer-deps --no-package-lock && npm install webpack@5.89.0 webpack-dev-server@4.15.1 @babel/core@7.23.5 @babel/preset-env@7.23.5 @babel/preset-typescript@7.23.3 babel-loader@9.1.3 ts-loader@9.5.1 style-loader@3.3.3 css-loader@6.8.1 less-loader@11.1.3 less@4.2.0 --save-dev --legacy-peer-deps --no-package-lock && npm install -g webpack-cli@5.1.4 && NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS='--max_old_space_size=4096' webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.js && cd ../backend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
